basics.label: Level 2 Critical Platform Support Engineer
basics.summary: Over 7+ years of IT experience specializing in CLOUD/Aix/LINUX/Solaris and WINDOWS Administration in Production Support. Strong background knowledge of Networking concepts and experience in Network Administration & Troubleshooting on AIX based systems.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: System Administration and Monitoring in an environment of 1800+ servers that includes CLOUD, WINDOWS and UNIX/LINUX envirionments. Hands on experience on Amazon EC2 web services. Experience on Hybrid cloud operations and management.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Providing Production Support Engineer for over 45000 SERVERS of AIX/LINUX/SOLARIS. Working on wide range of softwares, utilities, applications and protocols.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Practical experience with installation, configuration, upgrade and administration of IBM pSeries and Power5 servers on various levels of AIX 5.2, 5.3, 6.1, 7.1 and HP-UX 11.3.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for maintaining and administering 100 production IBM pSeries AIX 5.3/6.1 servers. Supporting a major initiative to migrate SAN storage utilized by HP-UX and AIX servers.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Working in 100+ IBM servers Environment. Setup and configured TCP/IP network on LINUX and AIX.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Data center support for AIX (5.3/6.1)/Linux (red-hat enterprise (4/5) ) platforms. Monitoring TIBCO, Java and Oracle application running on UNIX server.
